explanation: [0-0] In a room with gray stone brick walls, a pixelated cartoon character sits on the gray stone floor. The character wears a gray hat, camouflage clothing, and has a sad expression.

[0-8] Then his head is stretched upwards briefly. The scene then cuts to a room filled with lava and gray stone walls. A square pedestal appears in the center of the room with a dialogue box on the front, depicting a Toilet Man with a buzz cut wearing a gold chain with a dollar sign around his neck. A diamond appears from the toilet bowl, with a green arrow pointing to its upper left. The scene then switches to a pedestal with a thumbs-up sign, on top of which sits another Toilet Man. This one has side-swept bangs, is grinning, and looking forward. The scene moves to show a wooden sign planted in the stone ground in front of the lava, bearing the words "Only Choose One" in yellow. A blue arrow points from below left of the sign. Next, the scene cuts back to the pixelated cartoon character, who is standing still with a sad expression. He stretches out his hands, arms spreading to the sides, and looks to the left. A row of black toolbars appears on his chest, with four gray stone blocks on the fourth bar, and a yellow arrow pointing to their upper left. Afterward, a pink dialogue box appears in front of him, showing the two previously seen Toilet Men: the one with side-swept bangs on the left and the buzz cut one on the right. A yellow "Or" sits between them, with a mouse cursor below.

[8-14] The mouse cursor then slightly moves left and right, and the number "5" appears in the middle of the screen and begins to count down. When the countdown reaches "1", it disappears. The mouse then moves to click on the pedestal with the thumbs-up sign where the Toilet Man is, and at the same time, the pixelated character nods happily with a smile. The dialogue box in front of him disappears, and he turns his head to the right.
